name: Es Tiucil
description:
What is Es Tiucil?

     Es Tiucil is a brand new game in its early alpha stage.  The game is centered around the unnamed main character that is able to jump high and drag around almost everything around them. There's different materials and features being added regularly. This game is free to play as of now and will definitely remain that way until it's final release. At that point I'll only make it premium if it gets a lot of players and good reviews. Enjoy! :)

Controls:

     Jump: Up / Space / Shift

     Zoom in: Hold z

     Move objects: Click and drag

     Walk: w a s d or Arrow Keys, your choice.

     Walk through thin walls: e

     Restart: Click the restart button on the screen

     Quit: Since this is the browser version, quit is useless. You can drag it around the screen, though!
